description: Find many matches from some input using a parser.  Can send matches to new scrapers.

min.description: The first of the parser's matches to export. This is 0-indexed, so '0' is the first match.

max.description: The last of the parser's matches to export.  Negative numbers count backwards, so -1 is the last match.

name.description: If specified, each match will exist as a Variable under this name in their respective spawned scrapers.
